PACKAGES

distilltools

{distilltools} is collection of tools to support the creation and styling of content on websites created using the {distill} package in R.

Ella Kaye, John Paul Helveston, Michael McCarthy

EMK

A collection of miscellaneous functions I have written that I personally find helpful in a variety of contexts.

Ella Kaye

BradleyTerryScalable
{BradleyTerryScalable} is an R package for fitting the Bradley-Terry model to pair-comparison data, to enable statistically principled ranking of a potentially large number…
Ella Kaye, David Firth
